Stixbox Function

NOM

    pbeta - The beta cumulative distribution function

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

F = pbeta(x,a,b)

PARAMETRES

    • x : matrix (elements between 0 and 1)
    • a,b : positive reals, parameters of the beta distribution(x,a,b can be scalar or matrix with common size)
    • F : matrix

DESCRIPTION

    for each element of x, F=Prob(X<x) where X is a random variable with beta density 

      x.^(a-1) .* (1-x).^(b-1) ./ beta(a,b)1_{0<x<1}
